name: Leap of Faith (vieiragui)
description:
Entry for VimJam2

Hey guys , this is my first game ever. The goal here was just deliver something playable that someone can enjoy. Please, feel free to leave your comment and feedback.

I made this game for VimJam2 in less than a week while learning to work with Unity. The theme was "On the Edge" with a requirement of  "Boss". 

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys : Movements

LMB : turn your copies

R: Restart level
